metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Civilian_03 a3e04f8b-7727-42e7-96cb-b999503dd31e - (-102; 9; -230)

0.speaker: Legarioll
0.text: Back of the line. I already had to sit here while they marched some big bastard past like royalty.

1.speaker: Legarioll
1.text: There's a line. Order. If we can't keep that much, then we deserve to fall to some cult army.
